implementation_steps.task_description: Create project documentation. Include sections: Project Overview, Features, Tech Stack, Setup Instructions (how to open index.html), Usage Guide (adding, completing, deleting, filtering tasks), LocalStorage Persistence explanation, Responsive Design notes, and Contribution guidelines. No code dependencies, but provides context for all other files.

Implement the main HTML structure. Add , , with meta charset, viewport, title, link to style.css, and script src="app.js" defer. In , create a container
with: - Header

Todo List

- Input form: and - Task list
    - Filter controls
    with buttons , , Add semantic comments. This file will be referenced by app.js for DOM element selectors.

Add base styling and responsive layout.
- Reset margins/padding, set box-sizing.
- Style .todo-app container: max-width, margin auto, padding.
- Style header, input, button, and task list items.
- Define .completed class to show strikethrough and dimmed color.
- Style .filters and .filter-btn, with .active state.
- Add media query @media (max-width: 600px) to adjust font-size, button size, and layout for mobile.
No JS imports, but class names must match those used in index.html and referenced in app.js.

Implement core application logic in modular steps:
1. Define data model:
   - const STORAGE_KEY = 'simple_todo_tasks';
   - let tasks = [];
   - function loadTasks() reads JSON from localStorage, parses, assigns to tasks.
   - function saveTasks() writes JSON.stringify(tasks) to localStorage.
2. Define UI rendering functions:
   - function renderTasks(filter = 'all') clears #task-list and creates <li> for each task matching filter.
   - Each <li> includes a checkbox input (class='toggle'), span for text, and button class='delete-btn'.
   - Apply .completed class when task.completed is true.
3. Define event handlers:
   - addTask(event): reads #new-task value, creates task object {id: Date.now(), text, completed:false}, pushes to tasks, saves, re-renders with current filter.
   - toggleTask(id): flips completed flag, saves, re-renders.
   - deleteTask(id): removes from tasks array, saves, re-renders.
   - setFilter(event): updates active filter button, re-renders.
4. Wire up DOMContentLoaded:
   - Call loadTasks(); set currentFilter='all'; renderTasks();
   - Attach listeners: #add-btn click -> addTask, #new-task keypress Enter -> addTask, delegation on #task-list for change on .toggle and click on .delete-btn, click on .filter-btn -> setFilter.
5. Export (if using modules) not required; script runs in browser.
All functions and variables are defined in this file and referenced by index.html via script tag. Ensure function signatures match event listener expectations (event parameter).

plan.name: SimpleTodoApp
plan.description: A simple web-based to-do list application that allows users to add, complete, delete, and filter tasks. The app stores tasks in the browser's localStorage to persist data across sessions.
features: Responsive design for desktop and mobile

files.purpose: Main HTML structure of the to-do app, includes UI elements and links to CSS and JavaScript.
Styling for the app, providing layout, colors, and responsive design.
Core application logic: handling task CRUD operations, UI updates, and localStorage persistence.
